title: Chipotle Stock’s Momentum Can Continue, Analyst Says
text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill stock is rising Monday, putting it closer to notching triple-digit gains for the year. Telsey Advisory Group agrees that there’s plenty to like about the shares—but warns they look pricier than a midtown Manhattan burrito bowl with all the fixings.

The back story. While the S&P 500 has gained some 18% in 2019, Chipotle’s rally has been about five times as strong, as the shares are up 93.6% year to date. Investors with a longer memory may recall that several years ago the restaurant chain was beset...
description: The chain’s sales will be fueled by new menu offerings such as thin strips of beef and queso blanco toppings, a Telsey Advisory analyst says.
